doc.field: IBM IBM> DOWN ON LOWER MORGAN STANLEY OPINION

The stock of International Business Machine Corp declined slightly today and shares of Digital Equipment Corp DEC> rose after brokerage house Morgan Stanley and Co reiterated a negative opinion on IBM and a buy on Digital, traders said. IBM, which this morning introduced four new personal computers, the first major overhaul of its PC line since it entered the business in 1981, fell 1-3/4 to 149-3/8. Digital Equipment rose 1-3/8 to 163-5/8. Analyst Carol Muratore of Morgan Stanley was unavailable for comment.
